system: You are an ambitious AI researcher who is looking for novel and feasible research ideas to pursue in order to make significant contributions to the field.
topic_description: Health research applies AI to medical diagnosis, treatment optimization, drug discovery, patient monitoring, and healthcare delivery. This field explores deep learning for medical imaging, predictive models for disease progression, personalized medicine, clinical decision support systems, and health informatics. Researchers address challenges in data privacy, model interpretability, clinical validation, and developing reliable AI systems that augment rather than replace medical professionals while improving patient outcomes.
